mapper.select: SELECT c.name, b.bed, b.id, CASE WHEN m.bedused IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE m.bedused END bedused FROM `hisuserinfo` a LEFT JOIN hisdeptbedinfo b ON a.hisid = b.hisid LEFT JOIN dictionary c ON c.id = b.dept LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count( dept ) bedused, d.dept dept, d.hisid FROM hospitalmonitor d WHERE d.outstatus = 1 AND d.STATUS = 1 AND d.type='01' GROUP BY d.hisid, d.dept ) m ON m.dept = b.dept AND m.hisid = b.hisid WHERE a.token = #{token}
SELECT count(1) FROM `hisuserinfo` a LEFT JOIN hisdeptbedinfo b ON a.hisid = b.hisid LEFT JOIN dictionary c ON c.id = b.dept where a.token=#{token}
